List Credit Note Credit Note Line Item.description: List Credit Note Credit Note Line Item

Create Tax Rate.body:
const taxRate = await stripe.taxRates.create({
  display_name: '${1:VAT}',
  description: '${2:VAT Germany}',
  jurisdiction: '${3:DE}',
  percentage: ${4:16},
  inclusive: ${5:false},
})

List Subscription Item Usage Record Summ.description: List Subscription Item Usage Record Summary

Create Sku.body:
const sku = await stripe.skus.create({
  attributes: {size: '${1:Medium}', gender: '${2:Unisex}'},
  price: ${3:1500},
  currency: '${4:usd}',
  inventory: {type: '${5:finite}', quantity: ${6:500}},
  product: '${7:prod_xxxxxxxxxxxxx}',
})
